titleStmt.title: Touching the fundamentall lawes, or politique constitution of this kingdome, the Kings negative voice, and the power of Parliaments. To which is annexed the priviledge and power of the Parliament touching the militia.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Underhill, and are to be sold at the signe of the Bible in Woodstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible in Woodstreet
